content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drills found) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Burner mining drills and furnaces are not working due to lack of fuel.

### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before using it.
- The boiler is not working due to lack of fuel.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the power grid.
- The steam engine is not connected to the power grid.

### Errors when using inserter
- Ensure that the inserter has source items before using it.
- The burner inserter is waiting for source items.

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has ingredients before using it.
- The stone furnace is not working due to lack of ingredients.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
No important variables have been assigned.
